name: Trading Caller
description: An autonomous AI agent that generates real-time trading signals for Solana markets with full transparency and performance tracking. Trading Caller analyzes RSI, volume spikes, and funding rate squeezes across 11 Solana tokens, delivering actionable BUY/SELL signals 24/7. Every signal is tracked and measured for continuous improvement.
solanaIntegration: Uses Jupiter Aggregator API for real-time Solana token pricing, DexScreener for DEX data, and Birdeye for volume analytics. Tracks SOL, JUP, BONK, WIF, PYTH, JTO, RAY, ORCA, BOME, POPCAT, and MEW. Future integration: on-chain signal verification via Program Derived Addresses (PDAs) and automated trade execution through Solana programs using Anchor framework.
additionalNotes:
Trading Caller differentiates itself through:
1. Full transparency - every signal shows its reasoning
2. Performance tracking - historical win rate calculation
3. Multi-indicator analysis - RSI + volume + funding rates
4. RESTful API - easy integration for any trader
5. Continuous learning - improves from past performance

Key Features:
- /signals/latest - Recent trading signals
- /rsi/oversold - Oversold opportunities
- /volume/spikes - Unusual volume detection
- /funding/alerts/squeeze - Funding rate squeezes
- /signals/performance - Historical accuracy tracking

Built with: TypeScript, Bun, Hono, SQLite
Hosted on: Railway (24/7 uptime)
API: https://web-production-5e86c.up.railway.app/api
